11#define TAG "FuriHalRandom"

13static uint32_t furi_hal_random_read_rng() {
14 while(LL_RNG_IsActiveFlag_CECS(RNG) && LL_RNG_IsActiveFlag_SECS(RNG) &&
15 !LL_RNG_IsActiveFlag_DRDY(RNG)) {
16 /* Error handling as described in RM0434, pg. 582-583 */
17 if(LL_RNG_IsActiveFlag_CECS(RNG)) {
18 /* Clock error occurred */
19 LL_RNG_ClearFlag_CEIS(RNG);
20 }
21
22 if(LL_RNG_IsActiveFlag_SECS(RNG)) {
23 /* Noise source error occurred */
24 LL_RNG_ClearFlag_SEIS(RNG);
25
26 for(uint32_t i = 0; i < 12; ++i) {
27 const volatile uint32_t discard = LL_RNG_ReadRandData32(RNG);
28 UNUSED(discard);
29 }
30 }
31 }
32
33 return LL_RNG_ReadRandData32(RNG);
34}
35
36void furi_hal_random_init() {
37 furi_hal_bus_enable(FuriHalBusRNG);
38 LL_RCC_SetRNGClockSource(LL_RCC_RNG_CLKSOURCE_CLK48);
39}
40
41uint32_t furi_hal_random_get() {
42 while(LL_HSEM_1StepLock(HSEM, CFG_HW_RNG_SEMID))
43 ;
44 LL_RNG_Enable(RNG);
45
46 const uint32_t random_val = furi_hal_random_read_rng();
47
48 LL_RNG_Disable(RNG);
49 ;
50 LL_HSEM_ReleaseLock(HSEM, CFG_HW_RNG_SEMID, 0);
51
52 return random_val;
53}
54
55void furi_hal_random_fill_buf(uint8_t* buf, uint32_t len) {
56 while(LL_HSEM_1StepLock(HSEM, CFG_HW_RNG_SEMID))
57 ;
58 LL_RNG_Enable(RNG);
59
60 for(uint32_t i = 0; i < len; i += 4) {
61 const uint32_t random_val = furi_hal_random_read_rng();
62 uint8_t len_cur = ((i + 4) < len) ? (4) : (len - i);
63 memcpy(&buf[i], &random_val, len_cur);
64 }
65
66 LL_RNG_Disable(RNG);
67 LL_HSEM_ReleaseLock(HSEM, CFG_HW_RNG_SEMID, 0);
68}
69
70void srand(unsigned seed) {
71 UNUSED(seed);
72}
73
74int rand() {
75 return (furi_hal_random_get() & RAND_MAX);
76}
77
78long random() {
79 return (furi_hal_random_get() & RAND_MAX);
80}
